channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-6727] Table level stats for external tables are set incorrectly
item.description:
if you do the following:

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE anaylyze_external (a INT) LOCATION 'data/files/ext_test';
describe formatted anaylyze_external;

The table level stats are:

Table Parameters:
	COLUMN_STATS_ACCURATE	true
	EXTERNAL            	TRUE
	numFiles            	0
	numRows             	6
	rawDataSize         	6
	totalSize           	0

numFiles and totalSize is always 0.
Issue is:
MetaStoreUtils:updateUnpartitionedTableStatsFast attempts to set table level stats from FileStatus. But it doesn't account for External tables, it always calls Warehouse.getFileStatusesForUnpartitionedTable
item.summary: Table level stats for external tables are set incorrectly

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This issue also happens when the table is managed but specified a location which is not in hive warehouse directory on hdfs.
This patch is generated based on the latest trunk code
The patch is generated based on the latest trunk code.

Overall: -1 no tests executed
